body_html:
@jthestness Bazel recommends against a genrule specifying a directory as an input or output. It's best to have individual files be listed. I read your commit message, but I don't 100% understand yet what's going on here.

One thing that might help is if you run the following command:

less $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/cuda/BUILD

That will show you the generated BUILD file so we can get a better idea of what this genrule looks like, and why it's behaving poorly.

body:
@jthestness Bazel recommends against a genrule specifying a directory as an input or output. It's best to have individual files be listed. I read your commit message, but I don't 100% understand yet what's going on here.

One thing that might help is if you run the following command:

```sh
less $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/cuda/BUILD
```

That will show you the generated BUILD file so we can get a better idea of what this genrule looks like, and why it's behaving poorly.
